intro: Ophiorrhiza pingbienensis, commonly known as the Pingbien endemic shrub, is a small evergreen shrub native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in Vietnam and China. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
